alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 11:13AM EST until January 30 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Shoal River Near Crestview affecting Okaloosa County. For the Shoal River...including Crestview...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shoal River near Crestview. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above the flood stage of 8 feet by late Monday morning and crest around 8.1 feet Monday afternoon. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage by early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
